      • getObjKeyData

        public java.lang.String[] getObjKeyData(Sord sord,
                                        java.lang.String groupName)
                                 throws de.elo.ix.exec.IXException
        Returns the content of a DocMaskLine by given group name within a Sord-Object. WARNING: group name must be explicit within the mask otherwise the result might be false.
        Parameters:
        name - of group to look for
        Returns:
        content of DocMaskLine
        Throws:
        de.elo.ix.exec.IXException

      • getAllObjKeyData

                                             java.lang.String groupName)
                                      throws de.elo.ix.exec.IXException
        Return all contents of all DocMaskLines with the same group name as list of arrays.
        Parameters:

        contents of DocMaskLines
        Throws:
